column5: Dive into the world of finance with Southampton's MSc Finance, a highly regarded programme laying out a solid foundation in essential financial areas. Whether it's stock market analysis, corporate finance, or portfolio management, you'll be a promising candidate for top employers.What sets our MSc Finance apart is its distinct focus on quantitative and analytical techniques, offering an edge over other UK courses. You’ll have access to first-class resources and tools, gaining hands-on experience with financial databases like Bloomberg and DataStream, and software like Stata and MATLAB.Get ready to join our esteemed alumni, who have successfully established roles at renowned institutions like PwC, JP Morgan and Barclays.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
